data.oai_dc:dc: SBCLTER: Land: Hydrology: Stream Discharge and associated parameters at Atascadero Creek, Puente St (AT07)

Stream Discharge and water temperature were collected with a Solinst Model 3001 LT Levelogger at Atascadero Creek, Puente St in the Santa Barbara coastal area (site ID: AT07). Data are reported hourly. Stage values were converted to discharge using a rating curve developed with stream channel cross-sections, roughness estimates and the HEC-RAS model.
